description.brazilian: Encontre 100 Pergaminhos Espalhados.
description.english: Find 100 Scattered Scrolls.
description.french: Trouver 100 parchemins disséminés.
description.german: Finde 100 verstreute Schriftrollen.
description.italian: Trova 100 pergamene cambio-look.
description.japanese: 散らばった巻物を100枚見つける。
description.latam: Encuentra 100 manuscritos dispersos.
description.portuguese: Encontre 100 Pergaminhos Espalhados.
description.spanish: Encuentra 100 pergaminos perdidos.

description.brazilian: Coasts of Croakia: 50 bichos diferentes seguiram você depois de você fazer amizade usando o búzio de bicho.
description.english: Coasts of Croakia: Have 50 unique critters follow you after befriending them with the critter conch.
description.french: Coasts of Croakia: lie-toi d'amitié avec 50 bestioles uniques grâce à la conque à bestioles et fais-les t'accompagner.
description.german: Coasts of Croakia: Lasse 50 einzigartige Tierchen dir folgen, nachdem du dich mit der Tierchen-Muschel mit ihnen angefreundet hast.
description.italian: Coasts of Croakia: Fatti seguire da 50 animaletti esclusivi dopo averci fatto amicizia con la conchiglina creaturina.
description.japanese: Coasts of Croakia：小動物のほら貝で50匹のユニークな小動物と友達になって、後をついてきてもらおう。
description.koreana: 크로아키아 해안: 크리터 소라고둥으로 50마리의 독특한 크리터와 친구가 된 다음, 데려가기를 하세요.
description.latam: Coasts of Croakia: Hasta 50 animalejos únicos te seguirán tras entablar amistad con ellos usando la caracola de animalejos.
description.schinese: Coasts of Croakia：使用小动物海螺与50只独特的小动物交朋友，并让它们跟随你。
description.spanish: Coasts of Croakia: Haz que 50 bichejos únicos te sigan después de entablar amistad con ellos gracias a la caracola traducebichejos.
description.tchinese: Coasts of Croakia：讓50隻奇特的小生物成為小生物海螺的朋友，然後追隨你。

description.brazilian: Coasts of Croakia: Pegue 20 dos pergaminhos escondidos pelo Parque Ami-pélago.
description.english: Coasts of Croakia: Pick up 20 of the scrolls hidden all over Archi-Pal-igo Park.
description.french: Coasts of Croakia: récupère 20 exemplaires de parchemins cachés dans tout le parc Archi-Pal-igo.
description.german: Coasts of Croakia: Sammle 20 der Schriftrollen, die überall im Freundschaftsinsel-Park versteckt sind.
description.italian: Coasts of Croakia: Raccogli 20 pergamene nascoste in giro per il Parco Amici-pelago.
description.japanese: Coasts of Croakia：アーキ・パル・ゴー公園中に隠された20本の巻物を拾おう。
description.koreana: 크로아키아 해안: 구-운-도 공원 곳곳에 숨겨진 두루마리 20개를 모으세요.
description.latam: Coasts of Croakia: recoge 20 de los manuscritos ocultos por todo el Parque de las Islas Amistad.
description.schinese: Coasts of Croakia：在亚奇帕利戈公园里找到20个隐藏的卷轴。
description.spanish: Coasts of Croakia: Encuentra 20 pergaminos de los que están escondidos por el parque Archicoleguis.
description.tchinese: Coasts of Croakia：撿拾20個藏在阿奇帕群島公園各處的卷軸。

description.brazilian: Coasts of Croakia: Torne-se mestre do búzio de bicho e aprenda 5 linguagens de bicho.
description.english: Coasts of Croakia: Become a master of the critter conch and learn 5 critter languages.
description.french: Coasts of Croakia: maîtrise la conque à bestioles et apprends 5 langages bestiole.
description.german: Coasts of Croakia: Werde zum Profi der Tierchen-Muschel und lerne 5 Tierchen-Sprachen.
description.italian: Coasts of Croakia: Padroneggia la conchiglina creaturina e impara 5 lingue degli animaletti.
description.japanese: Coasts of Croakia：小動物のほら貝のマスターになって、小動物の言語5つを学ぼう。
description.koreana: 크로아키아 해안: 크리터 소라고둥의 명인이 되어 5가지 크리터 언어를 배우세요.
description.latam: Coasts of Croakia: conviértete en un maestro de la caracola de animalejos y aprende 5 idiomas de animalejos.
description.schinese: Coasts of Croakia：成为小动物海螺大师，并学会5种小动物语言。
description.spanish: Coasts of Croakia: Domina la caracola traducebichejos y aprende 5 idiomas de bichejos.
description.tchinese: Coasts of Croakia：成為小生物海螺大師並學會5種小生物語言。

description.brazilian: Coasts of Croakia: Pule em 100 gotas de orvalhos encontradas nas vitórias-régias espalhadas pelo Parque Ami-pélago.
description.english: Coasts of Croakia: Jump into 100 of the dewdrops found in lilypads scattered around Archi-Pal-igo Park.
description.french: Coasts of Croakia: saute dans 100 gouttes de rosée trouvées dans les nénuphars éparpillés dans le parc Archi-Pal-igo.
description.german: Coasts of Croakia: Spring in 100 Tautropfen, die du in den Seerosen im Freundschaftsinsel-Park findest.
description.italian: Coasts of Croakia: Salta in 100 gocce di rugiada trovate nelle ninfee sparse per il Parco Amici-pelago.
description.japanese: Coasts of Croakia：アーキ・パル・ゴー公園中の蓮の葉の露100個に飛び込もう。
description.koreana: 크로아키아 해안: 구-운-도 공원 근처에 흩어진 수련잎의 이슬방울 100개에 뛰어드세요.
description.latam: Coasts of Croakia: salta sobre 100 de las gotas de rocío halladas sobre nenúfares esparcidos por el Parque de las Islas Amistad.
description.schinese: Coasts of Croakia：跳入散落在亚奇帕利戈公园里的莲叶上找到的100滴露珠。
description.spanish: Coasts of Croakia: Salta sobre 100 gotas de rocío que encuentres en los nenúfares del parque Archicoleguis.
description.tchinese: Coasts of Croakia：在散落阿奇帕群島公園各處的睡蓮葉上找到100顆露珠並跳入露珠中。

displayName.japanese: アーキ・パル・ゴー公園ファン

description.brazilian: Coasts of Croakia: Há 16 tipos de bichos que são exclusivos do Parque Ami-pélago. Capture 50 deles.
description.english: Coasts of Croakia: There are 16 critter types that are unique to Archi-Pal-igo Park, catch 50 of them.
description.french: Coasts of Croakia: il existe 16 types de bestioles uniques au parc Archi-Pal-igo, attrapes-en 50.
description.german: Coasts of Croakia: Im Freundschaftsinsel-Park gibt es 16 einzigartige Tierchen-Typen. Fange 50 davon!
description.italian: Coasts of Croakia: Nel Parco Amici-pelago ci sono 16 tipi di animaletti esclusivi. Catturane 50 esemplari.
description.japanese: Coasts of Croakia：アーキ・パル・ゴー公園には独自の16種類の小動物がいる。全50匹を捕まえよう。
description.koreana: 크로아키아 해안: 구-운-도 공원에 있는 16종의 독특한 크리터 유형 중 50마리를 잡으세요.
description.latam: Coasts of Croakia: Hay 16 tipos de animalejo que solo se hallan en el Parque de las Islas Amistad, atrapa a 50 de ellos.
description.schinese: Coasts of Croakia：亚奇帕利戈公园有16种独特的小动物，抓住其中的50只。
description.spanish: Coasts of Croakia: Hay 16 tipos de bichejos específicos del parque Archicoleguis. Atrapa a 50 de ellos.
description.tchinese: Coasts of Croakia：有16種小生物對阿奇帕群島公園來說是很奇特的，從中捕捉50隻小生物。

displayName.italian: Il ballo del cappello di Azoria
displayName.japanese: アゾリアのハットダンス

description.brazilian: Coasts of Croakia: Pule no chapéu de vitória-régia de Grenu.
description.english: Coasts of Croakia: Jump onto Grenu's lilypad hat.
description.french: Coasts of Croakia: saute sur le chapeau nénuphar de Grenu.
description.german: Coasts of Croakia: Spring auf Grenus Seerosenhut.
description.italian: Coasts of Croakia: Salta nel cappello ninfea di Grenu.
description.japanese: Coasts of Croakia：グレヌの蓮の葉帽子に飛び乗ろう。
description.koreana: 크로아키아 해안: 그레누의 수련잎 모자에 뛰어드세요.
description.latam: Coasts of Croakia: salta sobre al sombrero de nenúfar de Grenu.
description.schinese: Coasts of Croakia：跳上格伦努的莲叶帽。
description.spanish: Coasts of Croakia: Salta al sombrero de nenúfar de Grenu.
description.tchinese: Coasts of Croakia：跳上格蕾努的睡蓮帽。

description.brazilian: Coasts of Croakia: Encontre o buraco na ilha e caia para a caverna abaixo dele.
description.english: Coasts of Croakia: Find the hole in the island and fall through into the cave below.
description.french: Coasts of Croakia: trouve le trou dans l'île et laisse-toi tomber dans la grotte en dessous.
description.german: Coasts of Croakia: Finde das Loch in der Insel und falle in die Höhle darunter.
description.italian: Coasts of Croakia: Trova la fossa sull'isola e cadi nella grotta sottostante.
description.japanese: Coasts of Croakia：島の穴を見つけて、その下の洞窟に飛び込もう。
description.koreana: 크로아키아 해안: 섬의 구멍을 찾아 아래에 있는 동굴로 떨어지세요.
description.latam: Coasts of Croakia: encuentra el agujero en la isla y entra a la cueva subterránea.
description.schinese: Coasts of Croakia：找到岛上的洞口，并掉落到下面的洞穴里。
description.spanish: Coasts of Croakia: Encuentra el agujero de la isla y cae por él hasta la cueva de abajo.
description.tchinese: Coasts of Croakia：找到島中的洞，掉入洞下的洞穴。

displayName.japanese: おみやげショップを出て
displayName.latam: Sal por la tienda de regalos
displayName.spanish: Salida por la tienda de regalos

description.brazilian: Coasts of Croakia: Obtenha e equipe qualquer bugiganga superior no seu bicho companheiro.
description.english: Coasts of Croakia: Acquire and Equip any Superior Trinket onto your critter companion.
description.french: Coasts of Croakia: achète et équipe ton compagnon bestiole avec n'importe quelle babiole supérieure.
description.german: Coasts of Croakia: Erwirb ein beliebiges hochwertiges Schmuckstück und statte deinen Tierchen-Gefährten damit aus.
description.italian: Coasts of Croakia: Ottieni un ninnolo eccellente qualsiasi e usalo per equipaggiarci il tuo compagno animaletto.
description.japanese: Coasts of Croakia：上級のアクセサリーを手に入れて、小動物の仲間に装備しよう。
description.koreana: 크로아키아 해안: 우수한 장신구를 획득하여 크리터 친구에게 장비하세요.
description.latam: Coasts of Croakia: obtén y equipa a tu acompañante animalejo con una baratija superior.
description.schinese: Coasts of Croakia：获得并为你的小动物同伴装备任意顶级饰品。
description.spanish: Coasts of Croakia: Adquiere un abalorio supremo y pónselo al bichejo que te acompaña.
description.tchinese: Coasts of Croakia：獲得任何高級飾品並將它配戴在你的小生物夥伴身上。
